llmSegmentedChunks.chunkText:
# Tax treatment of trader vs investor
Written by
Sebastian Garcia
Published on
April 11, 2024
For a trader, cryptocurrencies are considered trading stock.
For an investor, cryptocurrencies are an asset subject to CGT upon sale.
How to determine if you are a "trader" or an investor for tax purposes
There is no fixed list of rules to determine who is and who is not a trader. To accurately determine if you are a trader, you must consider your intention in undertaking the activity and the objective
